channel.title: The Rainbow Chronicles
channel.description: Join Reginald and Andy, gay spies, as they bumble through the world of espionage, evil villains and even a gay bomb.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Case File #666: The Case of the Gay Bomb
channel.itunes:summary: Join Reginald and Andy, gay spies, as they bumble through their first case together; "Case File #666: The Case of the Gay Bomb". Fifty episodes jam-packed with intrigue, thrills and laughs.
channel.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #01
item.description: Meet Reginald and Andy at home - not necessarily at their best.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Meet Reginald and Andy.
item.itunes:summary: At home, Reginald and Andy are normally the loving couple, but today things have gone a tad awry.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #02
item.description: Reginald stresses out over his sister, Griselda's, upcoming visit.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Reginald is about to fall apart over his sister's impending visit.
item.itunes:summary: With the threat of a visit by his sister, Griselda, Reginald stresses out over the very real possibility that she might find out that he is not what she thinks him to be.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #03
item.description: Andy & Reginald prepare the house for Griselda's visit.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The house is prepared for Griselda's visit.
item.itunes:summary: With Griselda only a short time away from arriving, Andy & Reginald madly scour the house for any items that would point to the uncovering of Reginald's 'secret'.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #04
item.description: Griselda arrives and immediately sends Reginald into a panic.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Griselda arrives for her visit.
item.itunes:summary: The time has finally arrived, as has Griselda, and she makes a bold declaration that sends her brother, Reginald, on a rambling rampage.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #05
item.description: Against his better judgment, Reginald tries to tell his sister that he is gay, but ends up saying something entirely different.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Time to tell his sister the truth.
item.itunes:summary: Against his better judgment, Reginald tries to tell his sister that he is gay, but ends up saying something entirely different.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #06
item.description: Reginald continues to dodge the truth with Griselda, and in so doing, ends up digging the hole of deceipt deeper.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The denial gets deeper.
item.itunes:summary: Reginald continues to dodge the truth with Griselda, and in so doing, ends up digging the hole of deceipt deeper.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #07
item.description: The truth about Reginald's sexual persuasion is finally out, but as he had suspected, Griselda does not take it well.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Finally, a confession.
item.itunes:summary: The truth about Reginald's sexual persuasion is finally out, but as he had suspected, Griselda does not take it well.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #08
item.description: The arrival of a telegram forces the revelation of Andy's secret identity as a spy. Unfortunately, this has dire consequences.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Another secret revealed.
item.itunes:summary: The arrival of a telegram forces the revelation of Andy's secret identity as a spy. Unfortunately, this has dire consequences.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #09
item.description: Griselda finds the opportunity to get out of the house before being killed, leaving Reginald the fall guy.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A quick exit.
item.itunes:summary: Griselda finds the opportunity to get out of the house before being killed, leaving Reginald the fall guy.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #10
item.description: A phone call from a bloodthirsty assassin forces Reginald and Andy out of their house.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Another quick exit.
item.itunes:summary: A phone call from a bloodthirsty assassin forces Reginald and Andy out of their house.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #11
item.description: Terrified for his life, Reginald drives himself and Andy to the airport at a frenzied pace.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Fleeing to the airport.
item.itunes:summary: Terrified for his life, Reginald drives himself and Andy to the airport at a frenzied pace.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #12
item.description: Awaiting their flight, Reginald and Andy grow concerned over several 'revealing' airport announcements.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Awaiting the airplane.
item.itunes:summary: Awaiting their flight, Reginald and Andy grow concerned over several 'revealing' airport announcements.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #13
item.description: Hearing the Bloodinator's voice over the airplane intercom system, Reginald panicks.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The Captain speaketh.
item.itunes:summary: Hearing the Bloodinator's voice over the airplane intercom system, Reginald panicks.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #14
item.description: Reginald learns more about Andy's secret mission, including a particularly horrifying way of exiting the plane.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The mission unplugged.
item.itunes:summary: Reginald learns more about Andy's secret mission, including a particularly horrifying way of exiting the plane.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #15
item.description: Parachuting to the ground, the two discover that they are under attack by an enemy plane.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Landing the hard way.
item.itunes:summary: Parachuting to the ground, the two discover that they are under attack by an enemy plane.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #16
item.description: Safely on the ground in the desert, Andy and Reginald look for procedural instructions.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A safe landing.
item.itunes:summary: Safely on the ground in the desert, Andy and Reginald look for procedural instructions.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #17
item.description: Reginald finds their instructions, but the consequences of this find are pretty stinky.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: This mission stinks!
item.itunes:summary: Reginald finds their instructions, but the consequences of this find are pretty stinky.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #18
item.description: Andy and Reginald begin their investigation through a rather peculiar portal.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: On the rocks.
item.itunes:summary: Andy and Reginald begin their investigation through a rather peculiar portal.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #19
item.description: Finding themselves in an underground disco, the two encounter an overly generous bartender.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Cocktail Hour
item.itunes:summary: Finding themselves in an underground disco, the two encounter an overly generous bartender.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #20
item.description: Awakening from the bartender's potion, the two find themselves in a precarious position.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Wakey, wakey
item.itunes:summary: Awakening from the bartender's potion, the two find themselves in a precarious position.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #21
item.description: The Black Widow begins her torture, and much to Reginald's horror he seems to be the sole recipient.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Let the torture begin.
item.itunes:summary: The Black Widow begins her torture, and much to Reginald's horror he seems to be the sole recipient.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #22
item.description: With the Black Widow temporarily out of the torture chamber, Andy and Reginald devise a plan to get the hell out.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A daring escape.
item.itunes:summary: With the Black Widow temporarily out of the torture chamber, Andy and Reginald devise a plan to get the hell out.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #23
item.description: Back wandering the desert, the two come upon an isolated mansion that turns into a trap.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Free, or not.
item.itunes:summary: Back wandering the desert, the two come upon an isolated mansion that turns into a trap.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #24
item.description: Trapped again inside the mysterious mansion, Andy and Reginald make a startling discovery about their captor.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A Cagey Man
item.itunes:summary: Trapped again inside the mysterious mansion, Andy and Reginald make a startling discovery about their captor.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #25
item.description: Escaping and fleeing to the basement, the two make a startling (and angry) discovery.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: The crowded basement
item.itunes:summary: Escaping and fleeing to the basement, the two make a startling (and angry) discovery.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #26
item.description: Trapped inside the mansion's basement, Andy, Reginald and Griselda attempt to go unnoticed when visited by Bunny The Bomber.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Hind and Seek
item.itunes:summary: Trapped inside the mansion's basement, Andy, Reginald and Griselda attempt to go unnoticed when visited by Bunny The Bomber.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #27
item.description: Tied together with a bomb, things do not look good for our heroes.

item.itunes:subtitle: Fit to be tied.
item.itunes:summary: Tied together with a bomb, things do not look good for our heroes.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #28
item.description: Bunny's bomb has exploded, but everybody seems to be okay. Well, perhaps 'okay' is not an entirely accurate description.

item.itunes:subtitle: Explosive changes.
item.itunes:summary: Bunny's bomb has exploded, but everybody seems to be okay. Well, perhaps 'okay' is not an entirely accurate description.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #29
item.description: Mutated by Bunny's bomb, Reginald and Andy try to get back home through the city unnoticed.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Colorful men.
item.itunes:summary: Mutated by Bunny's bomb, Reginald and Andy try to get back home through the city unnoticed.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #30
item.description: An antidote to Bunny's bomb is procured and administered, but the side effects are quite profound.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #31
item.description: An unexpected call from the Bloodinator sends our heroes fleeing to the street.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #33
item.description: Boarding Dr. Bigbad's submarine, the two are again confronted by a deadly foe.

item.description: While being threatened by the Black Widow, Andy reveals a secret weapon that will stop Dr. Bigbad.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #35
item.description: For some reason Reginald takes Andy's threat to end his life personally and the two end up not speaking, leaving the Black Widow to patch things up.

item.itunes:subtitle: I'm not talking to you.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #36
item.description: The Black Widow reveals her own secret weapon, sending Reginald into a four-alarm panic.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #37
item.description: The Black Widow reveals the truth about the 'gay bomb'.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #39
item.description: Back on dry land and with the 'gay bomb' scheduled to be detonated the next day, the two check into a motel manned by a frighteningly familiar clerk.

item.itunes:subtitle: Checking in.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #40
item.description: Reginald and Andy try to sleep but are continuously interrupted, the last time in a most deadly way.

item.itunes:subtitle: Who can sleep?

item.description: Following their latest bombing by Bunny, Reginald and Andy learn of an impending, quite lethal visit.

item.description: Reginald and Andy attempt to escape Bunny the Bomber but their plan goes terribly wrong.

item.description: Andy launches a hasty plan to save himself and Reginald from the Black Widow's deadly red ant brigade.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #45
item.description: The search of the 'gay bomb' continues, this time leading our heroes to an abandoned amusement park, much to Reginald's dismay.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: A not so amusing amusement park.
item.itunes:summary: The search of the 'gay bomb' continues, this time leading our heroes to an abandoned amusement park, much to Reginald's dismay.

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #46
item.description: Trapped, the boys find themselves going for an unexpected, and horrifying, ride.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: No ticket necessary.

item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #47
item.description: Andy deduces where the 'gay bomb' must be hidden and plans to leave the amusement park when he suddenly makes yet another startling discovery.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: What are you doing here?

item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #48
item.description: Griselda is once again rescued from her hidnapping, and the three prepare to head to the BB Building to find the 'gay bomb'.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Andy knows!

item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #49
item.description: Scaring the hell out of Andy, Reginald drives wildly through the streets of downtown in their race against the clock.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Reginald, you're driving me crazy!
item.itunes:summary: Scaring the hell out of Andy, Reginald drives wildly through the streets of downtown in their race against the clock.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard

item.title: Case #666 - Episode #50
item.description: At the BB Building, Reginald and Andy are finally confronted by Dr. Bigbad, his henchmen (and women), and the 'gay bomb'.
item.author: therainbowchronicles@q.com
item.itunes:subtitle: Can Andy stop Dr. Bigbad in time?
item.itunes:summary: At the BB Building, Reginald and Andy are finally confronted by Dr. Bigbad, his henchmen (and women), and the 'gay bomb'.
item.itunes:author: Jeffrey Lynn Stoddard
